Description: Application-Engine-RabbitMQInstances Template. This is a layer in the Engine application, which creates the InstanceProfile, and separate RabbitMQInstances.

VPCStackName.Description: Name of the CloudFormation Stack containing the VPC
VPCStackName.ConstraintDescription: must begin with an upper case letter and contain alphanumeric characters and dashes.

CustomIdentifierFunctionsStackName.Description: Name of the CloudFormation Stack containing the Custom Identifier Functions
CustomIdentifierFunctionsStackName.ConstraintDescription: must begin with an upper case letter and contain alphanumeric characters and dashes.

StandardCIDRFunctionsStackName.Description: Name of the CloudFormation Stack containing the Standard CIDR Functions
StandardCIDRFunctionsStackName.ConstraintDescription: must begin with an upper case letter and contain alphanumeric characters and dashes.

StandardAMIFunctionsStackName.Description: Name of the CloudFormation Stack containing the Standard AMI Functions
StandardAMIFunctionsStackName.ConstraintDescription: must begin with an upper case letter and contain alphanumeric characters and dashes.

StandardTopicsStackName.Description: Name of the CloudFormation Stack containing Standard Topics
StandardTopicsStackName.ConstraintDescription: must begin with an upper case letter and contain alphanumeric characters and dashes.

KeyName.Description: Name of an existing KeyPair to enable SSH access to the Instances
KeyName.ConstraintDescription: must be the name of an existing EC2 KeyPair.

RabbitMQRole.Description: Name of an existing Role which provides permissions needed by the RabbitMQInstance
RabbitMQRole.ConstraintDescription: must be the name of an existing Role.

LogGroup.Description: Name of an existing LogGroup which provides access to CloudWatch Logs
LogGroup.ConstraintDescription: must be the name of an existing LogGroup.

RabbitMQInstanceSecurityGroup.Description: ID of an existing SecurityGroup which controls access to the RabbitMQInstances
RabbitMQInstanceSecurityGroup.ConstraintDescription: must be the name of an existing SecurityGroup.

CompanyName.Description: Name of the Company associated with the Stack
CompanyName.ConstraintDescription: must begin with an upper case letter and contain alphanumeric characters.

SystemName.Description: Name of the System associated with the Stack
SystemName.ConstraintDescription: must begin with an upper case letter and contain alphanumeric characters.

EnvironmentSize.Description: Size of the Environment to build. Used to select size-related options in Mappings
EnvironmentSize.ConstraintDescription: must be small, medium, large or xlarge.

LinuxOSName.Description: The Operating System to use for Linux Instances

ProductsBucket.Description: S3 bucket containing 3rd-Party Products to be deployed
ProductsBucket.ConstraintDescription: must begin with a lower case letter and contain only lower case letters, numbers and dashes.

ProductFolder.Description: Folder within the S3 bucket containing Products deployed by this Template
ProductFolder.ConstraintDescription: must begin with an upper case letter and contain alphanumeric characters.

RabbitMQProductObject.Description: Object within the S3 bucket and folder containing the Engine RabbitMQ Component installer
RabbitMQProductObject.ConstraintDescription: must be a valid filename, not containing slashes.

ConfigurationsBucket.Description: S3 bucket containing Configurations to be deployed
ConfigurationsBucket.ConstraintDescription: must begin with a lower case letter and contain only lower case letters, numbers and dashes.

ConfigurationFolder.Description: Folder within the S3 bucket containing Configurations deployed by this Template
ConfigurationFolder.ConstraintDescription: must begin with an upper case letter and contain alphanumeric characters.

RabbitMQConfigurationObject.Description: Object within the S3 bucket and folder containing the Engine RabbitMQ Component configuration
RabbitMQConfigurationObject.ConstraintDescription: must be a valid filename, not containing slashes.

ApplicationsBucket.Description: S3 bucket containing Applications to be deployed
ApplicationsBucket.ConstraintDescription: must begin with a lower case letter and contain only lower case letters, numbers and dashes.

ApplicationFolder.Description: Folder within the S3 bucket containing Applications deployed by this Template
ApplicationFolder.ConstraintDescription: must begin with an upper case letter and contain alphanumeric characters.

RabbitMQApplicationObject.Description: Object within the S3 bucket and folder containing the Engine RabbitMQ Component application
RabbitMQApplicationObject.ConstraintDescription: must be a valid filename, not containing slashes.

ApplicationName.Description: Name of the Application associated with the Stack
ApplicationName.ConstraintDescription: must begin with an upper case letter and contain alphanumeric characters.

UseStaticAddress.Description: Create and attach a separate Static Address
UseStaticAddress.ConstraintDescription: must be either true or false.

LogRetention.Description: Number of days to retain CloudWatch Log Events (0 disables use of CloudWatch Logs)

Schedule.ConstraintDescription: See Scheduler Lambda Function description for Tag format.
